The Coding Den.Description: Have a general node.js question? Need some Javascript help? Or even programming in another language? The Coding Den is exactly the place you need to be.

Discord Canary.Description: If you're using Discord Canary, or the Android/iOS beta versions, this is where you report bugs - you did know, right? Also, a good place to get very up-to-date status on the state of Discord.

Dirigeants Headquarters.Description: The creators of the original GuideBot and the home for Klasa and Komada's frameworks, they provide a wide and fast support for both them and their pieces repositories.

Akairo.Description: Want to find out how to make the next big bot using Akairo? Join the official support server for the Akairo framework!

The JS Programming Language Community Se.Description: A place for JS programmers new and old to discuss JS, hang out, get help, find events, and more.

Discord API.Description: The original home of Discord.js' support channel, Discord API is still the place to go if you need general API help, need support for another library, or just want to chill in a 10000+ member server that's all about coding. Mostly.
